exclusion: When the lamp and indicator light are off (!) press and hold the button. After circa 2 seconds, when the indicator led starts blinking, release the button to start the exclusion process.
inclusion: When the lamp and indicator light are off (!) press and hold the button. After circa 2 seconds, when the indicator light starts blinking, release the button to start the inclusion process.
label: plugInDimmer
overview:
Basic operations

  • The Plug-in Dimmer can be operated both manually as with Z-Wave.
  • The Plug-in Dimmer can dim up to 125Watt.
  • The Plug-in Dimmer is easy to install and configured.
  • The Plug-in Dimmer can measure and report energy.

How it operates

A lamp can be switched on and off, manually by pressing the button or by Z-Wave using the basic command class. A (dimmable) lamp can be dimmed to a level, manually by pressing and holding the button or by Z-Wave using the switch multilevel command class.

category.label: Power Outlet
category.description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there

parameters.label: Reset to factory settings
parameters.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

parameters.label: Enable dimming
parameters.overview:
This parameter is used to enable the dimming option of the product.

When disabled the dimming and fading routine are disabled.

parameters.label: Maximum powerload
parameters.overview: The maximum powerload in watts when light is turned on, when measured higher then this value the Plugin Dimmer is automatically stops with dimming or is turned off.

parameters.label: Dimming speed
parameters.overview: The speed of dimming when activated (manual and RF). Dim speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

parameters.label: Fading up speed
parameters.overview: The speed of fading up when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

parameters.label: Auto meter report: percentage
parameters.overview:
A percentage that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent.

Minimum value = 1%  Maximum value = 100%

parameters.label: Auto meter report: watt
parameters.overview:
A watt value that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent.

Minimum value = 5 watt  Maximum value = 255 watt

parameters.label: Auto meter report: time
parameters.overview:
A time value that has to be passed compared to a previous sent value before a unsolicited meter report is sent.

Minimum value = 10 seconds  Maximum value = 255 seconds

parameters.label: Last known status
parameters.overview:
What to do with lamp status when power applied.

If 0x00: Always switch light off when power applied.

If > 0x00: Switch lamp on/off depending on last known lampstatus before power was disconnected.

parameters.label: Fading down speed
parameters.overview: The speed of fading down when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)
